channel.title: Lecture Notes on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Lecture Notes on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: l1.pdf
item.description: This file contains information about set and probability theory.

item.title: l10.pdf
item.description: This file contains topics: definitions, (Four) most common hypothesis tests Structures and hypothesis testing based on two normal samples.

item.title: l10review.pdf
item.description: This file contains topics: random sample, likelihood ratio test (LRT), one-sided test, two-sided test, generalized likelihood ratio test (GLRT).

item.title: l2.pdf
item.description: This file contains topics: random variables, discrete model and continuous model.

item.title: l3.pdf
item.description: This file contains information about multiple random variables.

item.title: l4.pdf
item.description: This file contains topics: expected value, variance, covariance and correlation, conditional expectation and conditional variance, moments and moment generating function and inequalities.

item.title: l5.pdf
item.description: This file contains topics: Function of a random variable (Univariate Model)and Function of a random vector (Multivariate Model).

item.title: l6.pdf
item.description: This file contains topics: discrete distributions and continuous distributions.

item.title: l7.pdf
item.description: This file contains topics: definitions and important properties of the sample mean distribution and the sample variance distribution.

item.title: l8.pdf
item.description: This file contains topics: definitions, evaluating (Point) estimators and point estimation methods.

item.title: l8review.pdf
item.description: This file contains an overview about point estimation.

item.title: l9.pdf
item.description: This file contains topics: interval estimation, useful results and constructing confidence intervals for ?.

item.title: l9graphs.pdf
item.description: This file contains graphs showing probability relationship between t- students.

item.title: Lecture Notes
item.description:
WEEK # TOPICS
1 Set and Probability Theory (PDF)

Basics of Set Theory

2 Random Variables, Probability Mass/Density Function, and Cumulative Distribution Function (Univariate Model) (PDF)
3 Multiple Random Variables, Bivariate Distribution, Marginal Distribution, Conditional Distribution, Independence, Multivariate Distribution (Multivariate Model) (PDF)
4 Expectation (Moments) (PDF)
5 Review for Exam 1
6 Random Variable and Random Vector Transformations (Univariate and Multivariate Models) (PDF)

item.title: special_dist.pdf
item.description: This resource contains graphs on Poisson distributions based on different variables.
